code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QuoteDisplay=()=>{const quotes=["Ride the storm, chase the rainbow!","Every cloud hides a silver lining.","Weather changes, dreams don't.","Let the winds guide your path.","Sunshine follows the rain."];const[quote,setQuote]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{setQuote(quotes[Math.floor(Math.random()*quotes.length)]);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center mb-6 sm:mb-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-base sm:text-xl italic text-quote animate-fadeIn",children:["\"",quote,"\""]})});};export default QuoteDisplay;
